title: France panorama. [No. 73/17]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: The new Cabinet - appointment of the first cabinet of the new French Legislative Assembly. Audiovisual media and communications - the International Audiovisual Media Show. Transafrican motor run - elimination tryouts for young candidates. 2. Telephones and electronics - a new giant telephone central in Paris under the Tuileries Gardens. 3. The arts: The sculptor Raymond Guidot - Raymond Guidot and his subjects. Felix Blaska in Grenoble - Blaska’s Ballet troupe has a port of call in Grenoble’s House of Culture.
